title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 177.3 - Definition of legal right
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 177.3 - Definition of legal right

State Regulations

As used in this Part, the term legal right shall mean a right
which a youth under the jurisdiction of the division may enforce at law because
it is granted by constitution, statute, court order, court decision, court
stipulation, regulation or policy. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 9

177.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
